message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm losing money every round we wait!
You're losing money, I can wait!
This is getting us nowhere, Bob. Let's be reasonable.  I'm taking a hit with each delay.
Time is on my side, but I'm willing to compromise.
This is ridiculous, Bob. I'm losing a fortune! Let's just split it down the middle and be done with it.
I understand you're losing value fast, but I've been patient. This is a fair compromise under the circumstances.
